creator: rob.griffin@oz.quest.com
text:
When running in verbose mode the FTP task logs entries like this:

      [ftp] logging in to FTP server
      [ftp] login succeeded
      [ftp] changing the remote directory
      [ftp] sending files
      [ftp] File C:\mylocalfile copied to xxx.yyy.com

Debugging would be easier if the remote directory name was printed afer
'changing the remote directory'

Created attachment 13476
address logging of timestamps and logging remote dir name

Includes changes to address logging of remote dir name after change, and time
difference.
creator: kevin.jackson@it.fts-vn.com
scohen@apache.org
text:
Actually, the Ant support code IS checked in to Ant, but not released as of today.
So, if you're willing to use a nightly build or build Ant yourself, this is fixed.

creator: scohen@apache.org
text:
The preceding comment was inadvertently committed to this page by me.  It
pertains to a different bug and should be ignored here.
